author: ReyerBand
body:
#### PR description:

- This PR fixes several lines in EcahRecHitWorkerRecover where the hits are declared with the flag kDead at the wrong argument position (4th instead of 5th), resulting in the extraBits variable being erroneously set to 10.
- As hits with the kDead flag aren't used in the reconstruction this isn't expected to have any impact.
title: Fix for EcalRecHits in dead channels with wrong bits set
